name: Android_505
description:
In a moment of sudden lucidity, you find yourself in a room- alone. You don't know what is going on but you have the urge to move. You're being watched.

Seize the moment- make a break for it...

Android_505 is a surreal "running simulator". The initial idea was for this to be an endless runner type game where you attempt to run as far as you can, with first-person movement controls. It ended up morphing into a more linear game.

I hope you enjoy playing!
